TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapDesignerDataSourceView extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView

Docs.summary: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner owner, string viewName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the view for which the data source provides data.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDesignerDataSourceView"> class using the provided <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> object and view name.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeData (int minimumRows, out bool isSampleData);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeData(int32 minimumRows, bool isSampleData) cil managed

Docs.param: The minimum number of rows to retrieve or create.
`true` to indicate sample data; `false` to indicate real data.
Docs.summary: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the provided number of rows and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the data is sample or real data.
Docs.returns: Design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control.

Docs.summary: Gets a schema that describes the data that is represented by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDesignerDataSourceView"> object.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"> or an object that derives from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema">.
